name: outputenvironmenthost
description: Outputs a hostname for the release environment, based on branch, whether this is a pull request, and desired service name.
author: Ahmed Sabbour

inputs.name: servicename
inputs.label: Service name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the service. Will be used in `<servicename>-<env>-<build number>.<clustersuffix>`

inputs.name: clustersuffix
inputs.label: Cluster suffix
inputs.helpMarkDown: For AKS, HTTP Application Routing. Usually in the form of `xxxxx.region.aksapps.io`

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Environment suffix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment, for example `dev`, `preview`, `preprod`, `prod`. Will be used in `<servicename>-<env>-<build number>.<clustersuffix>`

outputvariables.name: environmenthostname
outputvariables.description: The hostname appropriate to use with this release.
